name: Quest for your Life
description:
My first attempt at a game with Unity

Movement  WASD

Left Mouse Button: Attack

Jump: Space

First Power Up: Allows left click to fire

Second Power Up: Allows Double Jump

Third Power Up: Allows a double jump and slam to break obstacles and enemies 

This game was made in10 days for the GameDevTV game jam, so there are some bugs and lacking features. Thanks for playing!
